#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int T,N,arr[10001] = {0};
    cin>>T;
    while(T--){
        cin>>N;
        int a;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            cin>>a;
            arr[a]++;
        }
        int max = 0,index = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<10001;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i]>max)
            {
                max = arr[i];
                index = i;
            }
        }
        cout<<index<<" "<<max<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<10001;i++)
            arr[i] = 0;
    }
}
